jobObjective.state:
目前正在找工作
到岗时间：

projectExp.detail:
军民融合，向青少年提供航空科普的教育学堂及航空为主题的飞行体验中心。
Aviation park and popularization project
projectExp.name: 航空科普学堂/体验中心
projectExp.responsibility:
寻求合作方以多种形式投资
与团队制定体验中心及学堂整体方案
与合作方确定营销方式，并与教育机构、旅游机构合作，开展试运营。
Seek and negotiate with partners to invest and initiate the project.
Make the whole plan with team and ensure the schedule will be implemented in 
time, as well as make contracts with partners;
Making the sales plans and collaborate with education agencies and travelling 
agencies.
Get it into trial operation.

projectExp.detail:
2015年保障幸福通航水上飞机从浙江省调机福清市并完成期间的飞行保障工作及媒体宣传。
2016年保障幸福通航水上飞机从浙江省调机建瓯市并完成期间飞机保障工作及媒体宣传。
2016年保障广东幸福运通航水上飞机调机福清及长乐机场，完成省委书记尤权拉练工作。
projectExp.name: 福建省水上飞机选址试飞
projectExp.responsibility:
与团队协作制定整体方案并确保按期执行，并与合作方商定合同；
邀请政府、合作方参与并配合综管部门确定各方行程及准备；
向空军、空管局提出飞行计划及空域申请；
为飞行团队提供地面支持。
Make the whole plan with team and ensure the schedule will be implemented in 
time, as well as make contracts with partners;
Invite the local government officers and business partners and corporate with 
C.A.D to make a proper arrangement;
Apply the flight plan and airspace to Chinese Air Force and Civil Aviation 
Authority.
Support the ground service for flight.

projectExp.detail: 参与国内航展，并保障外籍特技飞行团队顺利完成合约中飞行任务。
projectExp.name: 特技飞行航展
projectExp.responsibility:
完成国内飞行航展工作，负责国内飞机的运输及拆装辅助管理工作、外籍飞行员的保障及飞行期间地面支持工作。
Keeping connected with airshow organizers. 
Assist with aerobatic planes transferring and assembling.
Support the ground service for flight and offer necessary radio connection 
between the tower and the ground.

workExp.company: 中国航空工业集团福建通航航空产业有限公司
workExp.detail:
协助制定发展策略，收集政府及相关局方发布政策，并形成报告，确保项目运行正确。
同政府及各合作方洽谈，并与各部门合作，推进项目进程。

推进航空产业项目运营，包括省际调机飞行保障、福建省内水上飞机试飞工作、航空文化产业推广、国内特技飞行航展外籍飞行员保障工作及地面支持、航空学堂创建运营及渠道合作等。
Collect government policies and form a report to boost the right direction of 
our projects once a month.
Making project plans and schedule PM based on specific process.
Prompt and guarantee projects going well with the schedule and contracts 
coordinated with partners.

workExp.company: 中国航空工业集团福建野马飞机制造有限公司
workExp.detail:
负责公司行政管理及人事管理工作；
对接政府及完成活动组织保障工作；
完成业务合同的推进管理工作；协调保障飞机生产下线工作。
Assist the HR officers with recruiting and performance appraisal;
Keep connecting with local government and related agency, including 
negotiating and promoting our business departments to go with the negotiation, 
which can be led to a quick response.
Send and receive commercial letters to/from others.
Organize and support important events of our company, especially in business 
activities.

workExp.industry: 影视/媒体/艺术/文化传播
